items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.
items.title: gridbox-dev/gridbox-mailer: Gridbox Mailer is a lightweight package built on top of Nodemailer. It simplifies email sending by managing SMTP connections, loading customizable HTML templates, and supporting attachments. Perfect for developers looking for an easy and efficient way to integrate email functionality into their projects.

items.content_html: A backend expense tracker built with Node.js, Express, and Mongoose is a server-side application designed to efficiently manage and track financial data. It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities

It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities
